subject: CPMS
title: Intro to Clin Phys & Mov Sci
info: overview of clinical physiology and clinical movement science. for students in such diverse fields as bioengineering, kinesiology, neuroscience, physical therapy, physiology, psychology, public health, occupational therapy.

subject: CPMS
title: Clinical Physiology Colloquium
info: interdisciplinary course meets 1st and 3rd week of the month. current research areas, scientific methods, and interpretation of results in the areas of clinical movement science and clinical physiology.
prereqInfo: undergrad level in basic anatomy and physiology is highly recommended

subject: CPMS
title: Sem in Clinical Phys/Move Sci
info: meets 1st and 3rd week of the month. current research areas, scientific methods, and the interpretation of results in the areas of clinical movement science and clinical physiology.
